channel.title: Home on Providence Healthtech
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Providence Healthtech

item.title: Global Health Initiative
item.description: The Global Health Initiative is Providence Healthtech’s committment to achieving the United Nation’s Global Goal of Good Health and Well-Being. Learn more about the Global Goals Providence Healthtech is committed to health equity around the world. The Providence Healthtech Global Health Initiative offers low-to-no cost EMR and Practice Management solutions to healthcare clinics in low and middle income countries. This includes a customized implementation to meet the specific needs of the local area, access to training material, and use of our cloud infrastructure.

item.title: School Nursing EMR
item.description: School nurses deserve high-quality EMR solutions. Providence HealthTech offers a comprehensive solution for school nurses. Whether you provide health services to a single, small, school or are managing a team of nurses throughout an entire school district, Providence HealthTech can provide an EMR solution that optimizes your workflow and reduces time spent documenting, leaving you with more time to spend caring for your students.

item.title: Schedule a Call
item.description: Interested in learning more about Providence’s various offerings, including our flagship electronic medical record software? Schedule a call to discuss how Providence can improve your clinical and business workflows or view a tailor made demo of our EMR, Polaris. item.description: Offering consulting services for your clinical needs.

item.title: Marketing Internship
item.description: The Marketing Intern is a semi-professional who assists in advertising and promotional efforts within the company.

item.title: Spreading Good Health and Well-Being
item.description: The United Nations' Global Goals, also known as the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), aim to promote global development and well-being by addressing a range of social, economic, and environmental issues. Goal 3, “Good Health and Well-being,” specifically focuses on ensuring healthy lives and promoting well-being for all at all ages. Providence Healthtech’s EMR software can play a significant role in achieving this goal by providing healthcare systems with real-time access to patient information, improving patient outcomes, and supporting population health management.
